statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'AES%';
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY key_name DESC;
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE id > 3 AND key_name LIKE '%key%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_value, id, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_info;
SELECT customer_id, encrypted_card_info FROM payment_info WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 'c91bd7bc-e3f2-404e-be4a-9191bbec99ae';
SELECT key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, encrypted_card_info FROM payment_info ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, encrypted_card_info FROM payment_info WHERE encryption_key_id = '9b9c7930-54b6-4d8e-abe7-20c3fce09d77';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, encryption_key, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT k.encryption_key, kh.action FROM encryption_keys k JOIN key_history kh ON k.id = kh.encryption_key_id;
SELECT pi.payment_method, pi.encrypted_card_number, kh.action FROM payment_info pi JOIN key_history kh ON pi.id = kh.encryption_key_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_info WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT id FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key = 'secure_key');
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM key_history WHERE action = 'generated' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT encryption_key_id, action, timestamp FROM key_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT key_id, created_at, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at;
SELECT card_number, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT log_id, action, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY log_date;

SELECT transaction_id, amount, card_number FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT key_value, description FROM EncryptionKeys WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id = 1 AND payment_id = 100;
SELECT e.key_id, e.key_value, a.action_type FROM EncryptionKeys e JOIN EncryptionAudit a ON e.key_id = a.key_id ORDER BY e.key_id ASC;
